title: Weather dashboard
description: Using the Open Weather API, this dashboard shows the user the weather for today, as well as a 5-day forecast, for the country they have searched.

title: Team profile generator
description: This team profile generator uses node.js and the Inquirer package so that a user can answer questions to generate a HTML file that shows profile of their team members.

title: Work day scheduler
description: A simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. This code uses DOM manipulation, advanced JavaScript and integration of third-party APIs.

title: ReadME generator
description: This README generator uses node.js so that a user can answer questions to generate a README.md file.

title: Bootstrap portfolio
description: A personal portfolio using Bootstrap framework.

title: Horiseon homepage refactoring
description: have refactored the existing HTML and CSS files in order to improve the accesibility and semantic structure of the Horiseon homepage.
